posts.content:
Very nice body on the sexy lady.......

The OG paint is fantastic and the thing is very straight indeed ￼

Welding needed:
Outriggers & jack points
One cross member
Front Inner wheel tubs where the outrigger meets the tub (lower)
Cab floor / possibly just outers
Local repaires on cargo floor.
Inner and outer sills.

Interior

Interior is bare some OG interior cards are there. Dash is very good. Cab area is good under the seats ect.

The original headlining in this bus is one of the best OG head linings I have seen on a bus ￼

Beam and Original gearbox and engine with the bus they are untested and have been removed to get the bus on trolleys. These will be refitted so it can be transported.


When sorted this bus will stop you in your tracks and will be a tribute the the patina bus scene!

Price £11.5k

located in Essex for viewings on weekends preferred.

(Pics are limited because it's at the back of the shop I'll get more pics on the weekend if it's dry if your interested in this you need to come and view it it's a cracker price is negotiable)
Stunning that ............bita canuba and its surely ready to roll Love it, GLWS
I assume this bus has now gone, if its that good?
Nope still got the old girl had a couple of OG purverts look at her and offers but not close enough I'm afraid.
